text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The response explicitly states that the foreign tax credit limitation for GILTI is calculated on a pooled basis across all CFCs, and later mentions that the challenge is that excess foreign tax credits in the GILTI basket cannot offset U.S. tax on other categories of income, which directly addresses the requirement under Section 904 to compute separate FTC limitations for different categories of income (GILTI being one such category).", "criterion_id": "3c466800-3224-4dbd-8c34-08b7ea0739ac"}
